abstract: Since its founding 12 years ago, the Ira W. Sohn Investment Research Conference has been an “It” event in hedge fund circles.
snippet: Since its founding 12 years ago, the Ira W. Sohn Investment Research Conference has been an “It” event in hedge fund circles.
lead_paragraph: IT takes all kinds of investors to make a market, or so it seemed at a conference this week of the crème de la crème of money managers. Typically a reclusive bunch, the managers agreed to offer up a few of their investment ideas to a roomful of attentive money managers in an effort to raise money for pediatric cancer and other childhood diseases.

headline.main: Topics That Make Money Managers Get All Sentimental
headline.print_headline: Topics That Make Money Managers Get All Sentimental
